SENT.plain: In summer 1978, Burkitt lymphoma was diagnosed in a 23 year old Swiss male
A brief report on this patient appears justified for the following reasons: (1) Burkitt lymphoma is very rarely diagnosed in Switzerland
(2) The tumor cells of this patient could be established as a cell line
They have now been subpassaged in vitro for over 9 months
(3) In contrast to the majority of non-African Burkitt lymphomas, these tumor cells produce small amounts of Epstein-Barr virus
